          <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
           The rapid growth of Indian economy in the last decade exerted pressure on the existing infrastructure in the country. India needs to build, upgrade and modernize its present infrastructure in order to sustain and accelerate its higher economic growth rate. With liberalization and the corresponding changes in government policies, the participation of private sector in infrastructure services has increased. The huge amount of investment required for the sector can be duly met through the public-private partnership model. This model has ultimately emerged as a vital tool to build, manage and operate infrastructure services efficiently.
          </p>
          <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
           The economic growth has also fuelled the aspiration for better living, intensifying needs for adequate housing and a better quality of life. The huge potential that real estate sector hold, have been acknowledged by the government, policy makers and professionals in the industry alike. The growing real estate sector also demands skilled manpower to look after the manufacturing, marketing and selling verticals of this burgeoning industry. Proficient
           <strong>
            <span>
             recruitment solutions
            </span>
           </strong>
           are required to meet their specific requirements. Performing
           <strong>
            <span>
             executive search
            </span>
           </strong>
           for this industry requires team of experienced professionals that understand the integrities of this major sector.
          </p>
          <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
           At
           <a href="../site/home.aspx">
            <strong>
             Careerist
            </strong>
           </a>
           , we have a clear knowledge of the ever-changing challenges in talent acquisition in this progressively complex environment. With our in-depth industry knowledge and deep insights into staffing solutions, we have become an integral recruitment partner of many leading names in this sector. Our
           <strong>
            <span>
             recruitment solutions
            </span>
           </strong>
           comprise of 360 degrees recruitment services from understanding the client organization with regard to existing business activities to Interviews, reference check and post-joining follow-up. All these functions performed during the
           <strong>
            <span>
             Executive Search
            </span>
           </strong>
           process are very critical for any client as they would further determine the quality of recruitment services.
          </p>
          <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
           To keep up with the accelerating growth of Real Estate and Infrastructure sector in the country, it becomes inevitable that at Careerist, we work round the clock and put in our sincere efforts to provide the best of recruitment solutions to this sector which have a major impact on the economic development of the nation as a whole.care
          </p>
          <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
           <em>
            For it is not the individual dreams, but the nations vision that we have to take care of in order to excel in the global market
           </em>
          </p>
          <p style="text-align: justify;">
           Looking for ideal candidates?
           <a href="../site/Client_query.aspx" target="_parent">
            Click here.
           </a>
          </p>
